item.title: Former Meta exec Nick Clegg offers careful criticism of ‘cloyingly conformist’ Silicon Valley
item.description: Meta’s former policy chief Nick Clegg seems to be walking a tightrope as he promotes his upcoming book, “How to Save the Internet.”

item.title: Netflix’s ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ is probably the biggest movie in theaters
item.description: This is Netflix's first time winning the domestic box office.
